title: Extra Large Swim Cap for Long Hair – Silicone Cap for Braids, Dreadlocks, Afro Hair – Loose Fit for Women & Men – Comfortable, Waterproof, Keeps Hair Dry
features: Designed for Afro hair, braids, locs, dreadlocks & long curls
Loose-fit silicone for comfort—no squeezing or headaches
Helps keep hair dry with proper use in pool or shower
Easy to put on and remove, even over voluminous styles
Stylish options available in multiple vibrant colours
description: Product Description Swim Without a Swirl of Worries This long-hair swim cap is a game-changer for avid swimmers. It shields your hair from water, ensuring you won't grapple with entanglements or the damaging effects of pool chlorine and saltwater. Our caps offer swimmers unparalleled peace of mind, letting them dive in and savor every moment in the water. Innovative Baggy Cap Design Our unique swimming cap is a true fusion of innovation and comfort. Boasting a relaxed fit that's no tighter than your everyday headband, it ensures your hair remains free from the usual pressures and strains. Gone are the days of discomfort from pressed hair buns, ponytails, and those all-too-familiar swim-induced headaches. For All Hair Types and Styles The swim caps are a universal fit for every family member. From the men and women to the kids, regardless of whether they sport dreadlocks, sleek straight hair, or vivacious curls, our cap is their perfect companion. Thoughtfully crafted to accommodate a range of hair types, it promises a comfortable and protective swim. Perfect Fit or We Make It Right We genuinely want you to have the best time in the water. So if, in the first 120 days, that swim cap isn't fitting just right, give us a shout. We're always around to help get you the perfect fit. After all, making sure you're comfy and happy while swimming is really what we're all about. Suitable for Sensitive Skin Silicone is the superstar when it comes to swim caps, and for good reason. Not only is it completely waterproof, but it's also hypoallergenic, which means no more post-swim irritations. Plus, with its impressive durability, you're investing in a cap that's built to last. Simply Slip It On and Swim Slipping into a Lahtak swim cap feels like a breeze, thanks to its stretchable design. It contours beautifully around the head, ensuring it stays in place without any hitches. With its smooth, firm grip, there's no chance you'll be pausing mid-lap to readjust. Tailor the Tightness Easily Getting that perfect seal is a cinch. Simply give it a gentle squeeze to push out any trapped air, and you'll feel it snug up just right. This intuitive feature ensures water stays out and your hair stays dry. It's all about giving you a fuss-free swim every single time. A Size and Shade for All Choose the sleekness of Black, the serenity of Aqua Blue, the cheerful essence of Bluebonnet Blue, the cool undertones of Mint, the soft romance of Rose Quartz, the pristine simplicity of White, or the robust richness of Windsor Wine. Each color is available in Large and Extra Large. Loose Fit Long Hair Swim Caps Swim Caps with 3D Ear Protection Loose Fit Long Hair Swim Caps for Kids Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.1 out of 5 stars 11,514 3.9 out of 5 stars 3,777 4.2 out of 5 stars 7,399 Price £16.99 £ 16 . 99 £16.99 £ 16 . 99 £14.99 £ 14 . 99 Available Sizes Large (11.4" x 8.0"), Extra Large (14.1" x 8.3") One Size Fits Most Extra Small (7.5" x 7.1"), Small (9.1" x 7.3"), Medium (10.0" x 7.9") Available Colors Black, Aqua Blue, Bluebonnet Blue, Mint, Rose Quartz, White, Windsor Wine Black, Bluebonnet Blue, Rose Quartz, Windsor Wine Black, Aqua Blue, Rose Quartz, Windsor Wine Recommended For Men, Women, Teens with Long Hair Men, Women, Kids Youth Boys and Girls Waterproof ✓ ✓ ✓ Stretchable ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ Made to Last ✓ ✓ ✓
